Các link tham khảo khi làm việc với Prisma ORM 7:

Tài liệu tham khảo cho prisma 7:
1. https://www.prisma.io/docs/orm/prisma-client/setup-and-configuration/no-rust-engine#3-install-the-driver-adapter
2. https://www.prisma.io/docs/orm/reference/prisma-config-reference#engine
3. https://www.prisma.io/docs/getting-started/prisma-orm/quickstart/postgresql
4. https://www.prisma.io/docs/guides/docker
5. https://www.prisma.io/docs/orm/overview/databases/sql-server/sql-server-docker#connection-url-credentials
6. https://www.prisma.io/docs/orm/overview/databases/database-drivers#how-to-use-driver-adapters
